participants.name: Scott Hathcock
participants.title: CEO/President at Northern Arizona Center for Entrepreneurship and Technology

messages.message: Thank you for the connect! I am on the job hunt and hopefully moving to Flagstaff soon. How are things looking on your end?
Hi Brian, what kind of work are you looking for?
I love software devlopment. I'd really love to work on AI. I just had a call with PNNL earlier. They are a supplier for DARPA.
Congrats on the new gig! Hope youâ€™re doing well.
